subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: T. J. McConnell had 17 points, helping the second-seeded Wildcats avoid an upset and earn a chance to avenge last season’s painful loss to the Badgers.
snippet: T. J. McConnell had 17 points, helping the second-seeded Wildcats avoid an upset and earn a chance to avenge last season’s painful loss to the Badgers.
